brownshome.scriptwars.client

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • brownshome.scriptwars.client.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class that clients can use to comunicate with the server. Example Usage: 
     
 public static main(String[] args) { 
        Network.connect(123456);
  
        while(Network.nextTick()) {
                byte[][] grid = new byte[32][32];
  
                int x = getByte();
                int y = getByte();
  
                for(int i = 0; i < 32; i++) {
                        for(int j = 0; j < 32; j++) {
                                grid[i][j] = getByte();
                        }
                }
  
                if(x < 30 && grid[x + 1][y] == 0) {
                        sendInt(1);
                }
        }
  }

      • nextTick

        public static boolean nextTick()
        Waits until all the players have made their moves and sends the data. This method returns false if the game is over or you have timed out.

      • hasData

        Returns true if there is still data remaining.
